plot: At the end of 1938, Jean Renoir got involved in a contemporary transposition of De Musset's play Les caprices de Mariane, soon entitled The Rule of the Game.
title: Heurs et malheurs de 'La règle du jeu'
plot_es: At the end of 1938, Jean Renoir got involved in a contemporary transposition of De Musset's play Les caprices de Mariane, soon entitled The Rule of the Game.
original_name: Heurs et malheurs de 'La règle du jeu'
